title: Imperium: Philosophy of History & Politics
description: The Noontide Press, Sausalito, 1969. First Paperback edition. 626 pages. Black lettering and hands-gripping-sword design on red white and black covers. Author died under mysterious circumstances 11 days after being jailed in San Francisco in 1960. This unprecedented, amazingly well-written book, is extremely scarce.
author: Francis Parker Yockey
